definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: It actually took all my luck to meet you for just a moment in my lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 在有生旳瞬间遇见你，竟花光全部运气。

sentences.english: But I am unable to relate the thrill and secrecy that subtle instant holds for me.
sentences.chinese: 但我无法描述那微妙的瞬间顷刻产生的震撼和神秘。

sentences.english: The number of jiffies that this process has been scheduled in user mode.
sentences.chinese: 瞬间的进程正在使用预定模式的数量。

sentences.english: Monitor took the plane crashed into the Pentagon .
sentences.chinese: 监视器拍下飞机撞进五角大厦的瞬间。

sentences.english: Moment such as sting, tight at mind, again difficult pull out.
sentences.chinese: 瞬间如刺，扎在了心上，再难拔除。

sentences.english: Improve matt skin tone, increase whitening and hydration degree.
sentences.chinese: 有效改善暗淡肤色，瞬间提升肌肤的白皙度和水润度。

sentences.english: When ill they are anxious for a hasty recovery.
sentences.chinese: 当他们患病时都渴望可瞬间康复。

sentences.english: The fish is so fresh, it is like a fish jumped on the table and cooked itself.
sentences.chinese: 活像是鱼自己跳上桌面瞬间煮熟般鲜美。

sentences.english: The principal Li Gongyan to enter the room her husband.
sentences.chinese: 委托人李红妍进入丈夫出轨现场房间的瞬间。

sentences.english: Sorceries and instants differ only in when they can be cast.
sentences.chinese: 巫术和瞬间的差异仅在使用的时机。

sentences.english: Then, in an instant, the moon went black.
sentences.chinese: 然后，在一瞬间，月亮变成了黑色。

sentences.english: You just have to see that it's wrapped in beauty and hidden away between the seconds of your life.
sentences.chinese: 你曾看到它的美含苞欲放，藏在你生命的瞬间里。

sentences.english: Sometimes love is hiding between the seconds of your life.
sentences.chinese: 有时候爱情就藏匿在生活中的瞬间里头。

sentences.english: Now, it has been already over 20 years ever since the start of the removal tendency.
sentences.chinese: 转瞬间，港商北移发展至今已有20年之久。

sentences.english: When Rhaegal roared, a gout of yellow flame turned darkness into day for half a heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 当雷哥怒吼时，一瞬间一股黄焰将黑暗变成白昼。

sentences.english: The ray in a twinkling gets black ugg tall seem period a meantime became night-time from the noon.
sentences.chinese: 光线瞬间变暗，好像时间一下子就从正午变成了半夜。

definition: in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
variant of 彷彿|仿佛[fang3 fu2]
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
